about_the_game:
Get ready for a fresh take on the classic Bubble Shooter Genre with Bubbits! Wishlist now and join the bubble-popping revolution today!

All Game Modes

Battle it out in massive 25-Player online Battle Royale matches or go head-to-head with friends in the intense 2-4 player VS Mode. Take on the world in the Daily Challenge, or embrace the timeless Classic Bubble Shooter experience in Solo Mode.

Fun Power Ups & Crazy Battle Events

Unleash game-changing powerups and adapt to dynamic Battle Events that change up the game. Climb the ranks to showcase your bubble-popping mastery!

Customization - Pop the competition in style

Whether you're casually playing or in the Final of a Bubbits Royale, bring your personal flair and make every victory your own. Customize your Bubbits experience with unique characters, adjust the look of your playfield, and bring your groove if you make it to the Royale Final. Enjoy lag-free online battles on dedicated servers, where your skills and quick reflexes truly decide your fate.

Join now

Add Bubbits to your wishlist and prepare for the bubble battle of a lifetime! Whether you're here for the massive multiplayer mayhem or the solo experience, Bubbits delivers non-stop action that's easy to pick up but impossible to put down!

Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Core i3 8350k or AMD Ryzen3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 630 or Radeon™ Vega 8 Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-9100F or AMD Ryzen3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 (VRAM2GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX550(VRAM2GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Pop your way to victory in a colorful next generation Bubble Shooter. Perfect for casual and competitive players alike! Compete in a 25 Player Battle Royale, Play VS with friends or go Solo. Customize your Playfield, unleash Power Ups and experience crazy battle events that shake up the game!
